effect_entries.effect: Provides access to []{location:southern-island} and either []{pokemon:latias} or []{pokemon:latios}, whichever is not available roaming around Hoenn.
effect_entries.short_effect: Provides access to Southern Island and Latias or Latios.

flavor_text_entries.text:

It features a drawing of an island.

ferry to a distant
southern island.
